quizDescription: Test your knowledge of horror movies with this spooky trivia quiz!

questions.question: In the movie 'The Shining,' what phrase does Jack Nicholson's character repeatedly type on the typewriter?
options: All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy
questions.answer: All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy
questions.explanation: Jack Nicholson's character, Jack Torrance, repeatedly types the phrase 'All work and no play makes Jack a dull boy' in 'The Shining.'

questions.question: Which horror movie features a killer doll named Chucky?
questions.explanation: The horror movie 'Child's Play' features a killer doll named Chucky, possessed by the spirit of a serial killer.

questions.question: What is the name of the fictional town where the events of the movie 'Halloween' take place?
questions.explanation: The events of the movie 'Halloween' take place in the fictional town of Haddonfield.

questions.question: In the film 'Psycho,' what iconic scene occurs in the Bates Motel shower?
options: The killer hides under the bed
The protagonist discovers a hidden room
A ghostly figure appears in the mirror
questions.explanation: In 'Psycho,' the iconic shower scene features a brutal murder taking place.

questions.question: What horror movie is based on the novel by Stephen King and features a terrifying clown named Pennywise?
questions.explanation: The horror movie 'It' is based on the novel by Stephen King and features a terrifying clown named Pennywise.

questions.question: Which horror movie follows a group of friends who stay at a remote cabin and accidentally summon evil spirits?
questions.explanation: The horror movie 'The Evil Dead' follows a group of friends who stay at a remote cabin and accidentally summon evil spirits.

questions.question: In the movie 'Get Out,' what disturbing procedure is revealed to be happening to the protagonist's victims?
questions.explanation: In 'Get Out,' the disturbing procedure revealed to be happening to the protagonist's victims is body swapping.

questions.question: Which classic horror movie features a character named Norman Bates and his eerie motel?
questions.explanation: The classic horror movie 'Psycho' features a character named Norman Bates and his eerie motel.

questions.question: What is the name of the demon that possesses Regan in the horror movie 'The Exorcist'?
questions.explanation: The demon that possesses Regan in 'The Exorcist' is named Pazuzu.

questions.question: In the horror movie 'Scream,' what is the killer's signature disguise?
questions.explanation: In 'Scream,' the killer's signature disguise is a ghostface mask.

questions.question: What horror movie features a group of friends who become trapped in a secluded ski resort and are attacked by cannibalistic creatures?
questions.explanation: The horror movie 'Wrong Turn' features a group of friends who become trapped in a secluded ski resort and are attacked by cannibalistic creatures.

questions.question: Which horror movie revolves around a cursed videotape that causes anyone who watches it to die within seven days?
questions.explanation: The horror movie 'The Ring' revolves around a cursed videotape that causes anyone who watches it to die within seven days.

questions.question: What is the name of the haunted hotel in the movie '1408' starring John Cusack?
questions.explanation: The haunted hotel in the movie '1408' is called The Dolphin Hotel.

questions.question: In the movie 'A Nightmare on Elm Street,' what iconic character haunts the dreams of teenagers?
questions.explanation: In 'A Nightmare on Elm Street,' the iconic character who haunts the dreams of teenagers is Freddy Krueger.

questions.question: What is the name of the demon who possesses the young girl Regan in 'The Exorcist'?
questions.explanation: The demon who possesses the young girl Regan in 'The Exorcist' is named Pazuzu.
